entities.name: george
entities.description: George is a student at Hogwarts and a member of Gryffindor house. He is described as exchanging looks with Ron but not saying anything.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts and a member of Gryffindor house. He is described as throwing the Quaffle to Alicia and playing Quidditch.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is a student at Hogwarts and a member of Gryffindor house. She is described as calling out to Ron and passing the Quaffle to Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts and a member of Gryffindor house. He is described as catching the Quaffle in the tips of his fingers and passing it to Ron.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts and a member of Slytherin house. He is described as calling out to Harry and laughing with the rest of the Slytherin team.

entities.name: alicia
entities.description: Alicia is a student at Hogwarts and a member of Gryffindor house. She is described as passing the Quaffle back to Harry.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is a student at Hogwarts and a member of Gryffindor house. He is described as passing the Quaffle to Angelina.

relationships.description: Malfoy teases Harry about his scar and suggests he needs a lie-down.
Angelina scolds Ron for not paying attention to the game.
Fred passes the Quaffle to Angelina.
Angelina passes the Quaffle to Harry.
Harry passes the Quaffle to Ron.
Ron throws the Quaffle to Alicia.
Alicia passes the Quaffle back to Harry.
